rationale: The segment reports market share but does not contain an intensifier modifying a risk-adjective.
statement_text: With this year's boost and demand from importers, Brazil is expected to hold a nearly 38% market share of the global chicken trade, up from around 36% in 2022, ABPA said.

rationale: The segment contains no high-potency verbs, potent metaphors, superlatives, intensifiers, or critical alert phrases.
statement_text: With this year's boost and demand from importers, Brazil is expected to hold a nearly 38% market share of the global chicken trade, up from around 36% in 2022, ABPA said.

rationale: The segment uses a future tense verb ('is expected to hold') which does not denote realised impact, although it includes scales ('nearly 38% market share', 'around 36%'). Also relates to financial/trade metrics.
